One of my favourites of the Bioshock series. The enviroments and combat flow together very nicely but the story is at times a bit to out there to truly understand it without going on youtube for an explaination( *cough* ending)

atmosfer mÃ¼zikler hayal gÃ¼cÃ¼ harika. ara bÃ¶lÃ¼mleri skiplemeye elim varmÄ±yor. dolu dolu hikaye ve gÃ¶rsellik.
Great graphics, great story. absolutely love it!

Would highly recommend this game. I got it on sale, and had hours of fun. Don't really understand the ending but FUN aha.  I find the first games a little scary, so haven't played them. Didn't feel like a miss out on anything from not playing them.

I AM COMPLETELY STUNNED..!!

After just completing the game, I am in total shock. So stunned that I couldn't even skip the credits. Without spoiling anything, you will be completely amazed of how they decided to end it off.

It's a great game and a cool change from a city at the bottom of the ocean to a city in the sky. The scene where you are lifted to Columbia is just as breathtaking as seeing Rapture for the first time. As soon as this scene happens, you know you're playing a Bioshock game.

People have been also wondering how Elizabeth's AI is. Absolutely flawless, this is in no way a co-op game like Resident Evil 5. You don't have to revive her or give her any ammo or anything of that sort.

Their are some horror elements to this game similar to Rapture, but it's more focused on Action and sci-fi. There is one part that did scare the hell out of me though.

Kudos to Irrational for another masterpiece. If you thought the story telling in Bioshock 1 was incredibly done, just wait till you get a load of this!

I give it a solid 10/10.

I have never had my mind blown like this in any game I have ever played. Holy fuck I know I am late, but god damn my head hurts im gonna go lay down and think about what i was just put through.... great fucking game
it took me a good 3 hours to figure out the ending, 10/10, best story in any game I have ever played.
I never thought I would be the one to fall in love with a girl in a video game. Why can't I marry her?!?!

This game is way ahead of its time. One of the best single player shooters if not the best.
probablemente la mejor historia de videojuego que jamas haya visto
The story is amazing, the gameplay mechanics is similar to previous Bioshock games, but I think every game has it slightly different, so it doesn't feel repetitive. One of my favourite games ever...

cool heroine, wanted to like it
Um dos melhores jogos que jÃ¡ joguei.
Una historia sublime que sitÃºa Bioshock Infinite en la cÃºspide de los videojuegos y de la literatura universal.

Just revisited this game after completing it years ago on Xbox and I am blown away all over again. I won't bother 'reviewing' the game as I think we all know what it's about now. And the less you know about the story the better. That ending... Bioshock is my hands down my absolute favourite gaming franchise and I can't wait to play the dlc (which I never played before). 

You are doing yourself a great disservice if you don't play this. However, I would recommend playing the first.. first. It obviously helps to play 2 also, but I feel that tells it's own story.
El mejor juego de la saga.
Amazing game! One of the best I have ever played! Great ending. Felt enganged from start to finish, and it has that classic Bioshock feel. 10/10
